title: Albion 1-0 Peterhead: Match Report
text:
Albion 1-0 Peterhead: Match Report 17 Oct 2015 17:01:00 
comments Late John Gemmell strike hands Albion all three pointsAlbion left it late to score the game's only goal in a 1-0 win at home to Peterhead.A John Gemmell strike put a positive gloss on a forgettable match for Darren Young's men.Neither side could find the breakthrough in the first half. Alistair Love had a header cleared off the line for the home side, and the same player forced a superb save from Graeme Smith.There was little further sign of a breakthrough until a slack backpass by the visitors allowed Gemmell in to round Smith, and score.Kevin Dzierzawski had a late chance to draw the sides level, but Ross Stewart saved superbly as Peterhead's winless league run extended to seven matches.
